Articles.Content: Does he have a fourms account? If so please tell me his user name. Just wanted to know if he does. If you ARE Scott please reply.
I think he does...from,what i've heard. Can't tell you his username, however. I don't know,it either.
Yes he does have a forum account I can confirm...good luck looking for him though. No, his username is NOT Scott Manley.

> 
> Yes he does have a forum account I can confirm...good luck looking for him though. No, his username is NOT Scott Manley.

tried it before i posted it.![:rolleyes:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_rolleyes.gif)

He does have an account, and his forum username is illectro
